## Research Interests

- Avian pathogenic *Escherichia coli* (APEC) pathogenesis and vaccine development
- *Campylobacter jejuni* prevalence, antimicrobial resistance, and vaccine candidates
- Rapid molecular detection of poultry pathogens (LAMP, qPCR)
- Poultry gut microbiome analysis and culturomics
- Woody breast myopathy mechanisms in broilers
- Food safety and pathogen genomics
